question: when did the first immigrants come to hawaii
vanilla_rag_result: The first immigrants are believed to have arrived in Hawaii no later than 800 AD, with evidence of settlement continuing until about 1300 AD. These early settlers came from the Marquesas, Tonga, Samoa, Easter Island, and greater Polynesia. Additionally, Chinese sailors first arrived in Hawaii in 1778, and more Chinese workers settled in Hawaii starting in 1789.
